function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The text discusses the impact of brand image on consumer attitudes and brand equity, but does not address the risk of contagious diseases propagation","Impact":"Failure to consider contagious diseases propagation risks could lead to neglecting important public health concerns in the built environment","Mitigation":"Include a section on the potential impact of contagious diseases on consumer behavior and brand image, and educate stakeholders about the importance of public health in brand management","Technologies":"Public health monitoring systems, air filtration systems, and sanitation technology","People":"Consumers, brand managers, public health officials","Owner":"Brand management teams, public health organizations, building management authorities"}]}
